document_data.name: Sculptures for the Elite
document_data.source: [[City of Delights|City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Sculptures for the Elite''' was a shop located in the [[Grand Bazaar]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: This shop was located on the south side of the bazaar. Splendid sculptures of [[obsidian]] and [[marble]] could be purchased here. Life-sized sculptures could be ordered and ready in as little as two days, assuming the customer would pose during part of that time.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Jera al-Farif]] owned and operated this establishment.
